languages.text: {n}Паскаль переходит на бинарную речь, сопровождая каждую манипуляцию строкой священного гимна. Удивительно, но даже сквозь хрипы {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} чувствуется благоговение, которым наполнен голос {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножреца{/g}. Внезапно все огни на короне сервитора вспыхивают.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Паскаль переходит на бинарную речь, сопровождая каждую манипуляцию строкой священного гимна. Удивительно, но даже сквозь хрипы {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} чувствуется благоговение, которым наполнен голос {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножреца{/g}. Внезапно все огни на короне сервитора вспыхивают.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal switches to binharic speech, accompanying his every action with a line from a sacred hymn. It is amazing how the reverent awe in the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s voice can be discerned even through his rattling {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. Suddenly every light on the servitor's crown comes alive.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль переходит на бинарную речь, сопровождая каждую манипуляцию строкой священного гимна. languages.text: {n}Pasqal wechselt in Binhärsprech, jede seiner Bewegungen wird von einer Zeile aus einer heiligen Hymne begleitet. Er ist erstaunlich, wie die andachtsvolle Ehrfurcht in der Stimme des {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriesters{/g} sogar durch das rasselnde {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} wahrzunehmen ist. Plötzlich erwachen sämtliche Lichter in der Krone des Servitors.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal switches to binharic speech, accompanying his every action with a line from a sacred hymn. It is amazing how the reverent awe in the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s voice can be discerned even through his rattling {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. Suddenly every light on the servitor's crown comes alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal wechselt in Binhärsprech, jede seiner Bewegungen wird von einer Zeile aus einer heiligen Hymne begleitet. Er ist erstaunlich, wie die andachtsvolle Ehrfurcht in der Simme des {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriesters{/g} sogar durch das rasselnde {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} wahrzunehmen ist. Plötzlich erwachen sämtliche Lichter in der Krone des Servitors.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal passe en discours binhaire, ponctuant chacune de ses actions par un vers d'un hymne sacré. Il est étonnant de constater combien l'admiration qui transparaît dans la voix du {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} ressort clairement de son {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}, malgré les interférences. Soudain, tous les voyants de la couronne du servitor s'illuminent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal switches to binharic speech, accompanying his every action with a line from a sacred hymn. It is amazing how the reverent awe in the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s voice can be discerned even through his rattling {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. Suddenly every light on the servitor's crown comes alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal passe en discours binhaire, ponctuant chacune de ses actions par un vers d'un l'hymne sacré. Il est étonnant de constater combien l'admiration qui transparaît dans la voix du {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} ressort clairement de son {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}, malgré les interférences. Soudain, tous les voyants de la couronne du servitor s'illuminent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡改用二进制语言吟唱起来。他每念出一句神圣祷词，就进行一项操作。令人惊讶的是，即使{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置的静电声十分刺耳，也无法掩盖这位{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}声音中虔诚的敬畏。突然之间，机仆冠冕上所有的灯都亮了起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal switches to binharic speech, accompanying his every action with a line from a sacred hymn. It is amazing how the reverent awe in the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s voice can be discerned even through his rattling {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. Suddenly every light on the servitor's crown comes alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡改用二进制语言吟唱起来。他念出一句神圣祷词，就进行一项操作。令人惊讶的是，即使{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}的静电声十分刺耳，也无法掩盖这位{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}声音中虔诚的敬畏。突然之间，奴工冠冕上所有的灯都亮了起来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルは2進数の言葉に切り替えると、神聖なる聖歌の詩と同時に体をひとつずつ動かした。素晴らしいことだ、ガラガラの{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}ヴォクス{/g}越しでも、{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}技術司祭{/g}の恭しく迫るような声がハッキリ伝わる。突然、サーヴィターの王冠のライトが全て光った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal switches to binharic speech, accompanying his every action with a line from a sacred hymn. It is amazing how the reverent awe in the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s voice can be discerned even through his rattling {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. Suddenly every light on the servitor's crown comes alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは2進数の言葉に切り替えると、神聖なる聖歌の詩と同時に体をひとつずつ動かした。素晴らしいことだ、ガラガラの{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}越しでも、{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}の恭しく迫るような声がハッキリ伝わる。突然、サーヴィターの王冠のライトが全て光った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal cambia al lenguaje binario, acompañando cada acción con una frase de un himno sagrado. Es asombroso cómo el temor reverente en la voz del {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} se puede discernir incluso a través del traqueteo de su {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}. De repente, todas las luces de la corona del servidor cobran vida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal switches to binharic speech, accompanying his every action with a line from a sacred hymn. It is amazing how the reverent awe in the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s voice can be discerned even through his rattling {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. Suddenly every light on the servitor's crown comes alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal cambia al lenguaje binario, acompañando cada acción con una frase de un himno sagrado. Es asombroso cómo el temor reverente en la voz del {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tecnosacerdote{/g} se puede discernir incluso a través del ruidoso {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}. De repente, todas las luces de la corona del servidor cobran vida.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal ikilidil konuşmaya başlıyor ve her hareketine kutsal bir ilahinin sözleri eşlik ediyor. {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip'in{/g} cızırdayan {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksuna{/g} rağmen, sesindeki hürmetle karışık huşuyu seçebilmek muhteşem bir his. Derken hizmetörün tacındaki tüm ışıklar bir anda yanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal switches to binharic speech, accompanying his every action with a line from a sacred hymn. It is amazing how the reverent awe in the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s voice can be discerned even through his rattling {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. Suddenly every light on the servitor's crown comes alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal ikilidil konuşmaya başlıyor ve her hareketine kutsal ilahinin sözleri eşlik ediyor. {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}'in sesi her ne kadar {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g}unun gürültüsüyle bastırılıyor olsa da ses tonundaki hürmetle karışık dehşeti hissetmemek elde değil. Servitörün tacındaki tüm ışıklar bir anda yanıyor.{/n}
